Reviews.Title: Horrible - Manufacturer unloads these and are know defective
Reviews.Author: G.J. Thomas
Reviews.Content: These are complete garbage. These come from a low end distributor in China. Most come from Chinavasion who then supplies resellers. A common complaint is the microphone is so quiet that the person that you call can't hear you. The manufacturer (and most resellers) even promise a warranty and tech support, but when you need it, they never help and frequently require you to ship the product overseas to China (very expensive shipping), and once hey get it they claim no responsibility and keep the product unless you send them more money!I stopped carrying any product that is featured on Chinavasion because of the constant complaints that I receive about them.Chinavasion even fakes reviews on their website (and does not allow anyone to post negative reviews).  Google it. The main manufacturer (Chinavasion) is a fraudulent company. ANY product on chinavasions website is highly suspicious.

ProductInfo.Features:
New Android 2.2 operating system
Bright and colorful 3.2 inch capacitive touch screen
TV antenna for receiving free over the air analog TV
Fully Unlocked: Can use with any GSM service provider around the world
ProductInfo.Name: Eclipse Novus - Dual SIM Android 2.2 Smartphone with Capacitive Touchscreen (Black)
